title: Classified Ads Thread
summary:
Key ideas
- Scott is away at a conference and won't be blogging for the day.
- Instead, he suggests having people post ads for jobs, housing, products, websites, etc.
- Personal ads are welcomed from women and gay people, but not from straight men due to the demographics of the blog's readership.

Key learnings
- This post doesn't provide direct learning points but offers a different type of content for readers to engage with.

Key questions
- None mentioned.
